Minecraft World Development and Instructional Programming

Today's teens have a variety of interests, but if you're looking for a common interest, it's Minecraft. This course is based on the Minecraft game, through introducing world creation, Minecraft command line commands Control, and the MakeCode graphical programming platform, gradually bring children into the world of programming.

Try a free class!
Contact Us

Category: 

Game Programming

Grade Level: 

K-3

Skill Level: 

Beginner

Class Ratio: 

less than 1:4

  • Course Details
  • Course Objectives
  • Teaching Methods

Minecraft is popular all over the world, we use popular games to bring children into the world of programming

The Minecraft game, which is popular all over the world, provides unlimited space for children's creativity. Create the world you want by hand, and the door of technology and electronics will be opened for you.

Minecraft provides gamers with a series of game control commands. By learning these commands, you can achieve effects that cannot be achieved in the game. Learning these basic commands, you can build a programming thinking foundation unconsciously.

When programming skills are so important today, schools have begun to let students learn programming from preschool. The Minecraft MakeCode programming platform makes this goal a reality.

Publish your own world on the Internet, exchange your work with young programmers from all over the world, and let everyone praise your creativity! Maybe you will be the next Internet celebrity.

What you should expect to gain from this course.

  • Make a personalized world model
  • Learn command line command control and programming
  • Master the basics of graphics programming
  • Learn hands-on problem-solving skills in practice
  • Cultivate the ability of scientific innovation and teamwork
  • Train students' ability to adapt to new environments

Our methods of instruction promote success.

Fun programming is our top priority when designing all the content.

Learn from real industry experienced instructors and researchers.

Get your questions answered in class and grow with your classmates in a competitive environment.

Learn by doing is the key for Computer Science study, all assignments and projects are designed for your goals.

Learning programming is not the ultimate goal. We focus on pushing kids' imagination and creativity.

Programming is just the first step for our students' futures. Build projects and attend science fairs will help students get into the top unversities.
